original_title: How Much Bull Can You Take - Part Eight
overview: BUFFALO BULL TAILER... It’s every adventurous boy’s dream to live on the edge, to live the life of a hunter. For most of us it will remain an unrealised dream. Do these rare opportunities exist? Come explore the life of a Buffalo Bull Tailer. Despite many obstacles, he claims working some of the most awesome & secluded country in Australia is a privilege. The hours & logistics involved in proefessionally harvesting large dangerous animals is not a life for the short haulers or the faint hearted.  Plus The Borroloola Bush Rodeo!
title: How Much Bull Can You Take - Part Eight
